price: 55. A-koros addunyal maaluu kee xaylo keenih kah naceem kayriy cakkisitaanay keenih niysissike yakkaleenii?
arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٖ وَبَنِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: ayaḥsabūna annamā numidduhum bihi min mālin wabanīna
